snippet.title: SRB2Kart v2 - Christmas Bonus - Joypolis Showcase
snippet.description:
Mapping & Textures: Chengi
Track Music: When We Reach For You ~ Could It Be Right? - Sonic The Hedgehog ~ Remix
Results music: Leila Wilson (Sonic 3 Alternate Album) - Competition Menu

Take an exclusive video tour down memory lane in this new, original level, Joypolis Zone!

Take a leisurely stroll through the vibrant indoor amusement park and boost through the escalators to find the quickest route to the finish! Master your Trick Panel skills with the Trick Balloons scattered throughout the course -- be careful though, those balloons don't stick around for very long.

Wait a minute, something about those buildings seems familiar... That escalator, too...

(EDITOR'S NOTE: The footage in this video was recorded with camera tilting disabled to showcase the map visuals as cleanly as possible; though this feature in particular still remains a toggle for accessibility purposes. Please also disregard any framerate issues shown as they're intended to be fixed later down the line. Some gameplay elements/visuals may be considered incomplete or subject to change.) 

DISCORD: kartkrew.org/discord
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/KartKrewDev
